item.content:encoded:
Ng√†y nay, JavaScript l√† m·ªôt trong nh·ªØng ng√¥n ng·ªØ l·∫≠p tr√¨nh ph·ªï bi·∫øn nh·∫•t tr√™n th·∫ø gi·ªõi. N√≥ ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng b·ªüi nhi·ªÅu c√¥ng ty nh∆∞ Google, Facebook, Microsoft, v.v. ƒë·ªÉ x√¢y d·ª±ng c√°c ·ª©ng d·ª•ng web. JavaScript l√† m·ªôt ng√¥n ng·ªØ r·∫•t m·∫°nh m·∫Ω c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë·ªÉ x√¢y d·ª±ng c√°c ·ª©ng d·ª•ng web ph·ª©c t·∫°p. N√≥ c≈©ng l√† m·ªôt ng√¥n ng·ªØ r·∫•t linh ho·∫°t c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c s·ª≠ d·ª•ng ƒë·ªÉ x√¢y d·ª±ng c√°c ·ª©ng d·ª•ng web ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n.

Trong b√†i vi·∫øt n√†y, t√¥i s·∫Ω li·ªát k√™ m·ªôt s·ªë h√†m ti·ªán √≠ch JavaScript h·ªØu √≠ch nh·∫•t m√† t√¥i ƒë√£ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng trong c√°c d·ª± √°n c·ªßa m√¨nh.

1. GetValuesByKey‚Äã

H√†m n√†y s·∫Ω gi√∫p b·∫°n l·∫•y c√°c gi√° tr·ªã c√≥ c√πng t√™n field trong m·ªôt object, bao g·ªìm c√°c object con l·ªìng nhau. N√≥ s·∫Ω tr·∫£ v·ªÅ m·ªôt m·∫£ng c√°c gi√° tr·ªã t√¨m ƒë∆∞·ª£c.

  • Source code üìÉ
  • Ch·∫°y th·ª≠ üßë‚Äçüíª
GetValuesByKey.js
/**
 * Get all values of specific key in object
 * @param {object} obj A javascript object to get values
 * @param {string} key A key of object
 * @returns 
 */
function GetValuesByKey(obj, key) {
    let values = [];
    for (let i in obj) {
        if (!obj.hasOwnProperty(i)) continue;
        if (typeof obj[i] == 'object') {
            values = values.concat(GetValuesByKey(obj[i], key));
        } else if (i == key) {
            values.push(obj[i]);
        }
    }
    return values;
}
Tr√¨nh so·∫°n th·∫£o tr·ª±c tuy·∫øn
function GetValuesByKey(obj, key) {
    let values = [];
    for (let i in obj) {
        if (!obj.hasOwnProperty(i)) continue;
        if (typeof obj[i] == 'object') {
            values = values.concat(GetValuesByKey(obj[i], key));
        } else if (i == key) {
            values.push(obj[i]);
        }
    }
    return values;
}


const data = {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Item 1",
    "link": "/item-1",
    "relatedItems": [
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Item 2",
            "link": "/item-2"
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "name": "Item 3",
            "link": "/item-3"
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "name": "Item 4",
            "link": "/item-4"
        }
    ]
}


var result = GetValuesByKey(data, "link");
render(JSON.stringify(result));
K·∫øt qu·∫£
Loading...

2. Flatten object‚Äã

2.1. Flatten object‚Äã

H√†m n√†y s·∫Ω gi√∫p b·∫°n l√†m ph·∫≥ng m·ªôt object c√≥ c√°c object con l·ªìng nhau. N√≥ s·∫Ω tr·∫£ v·ªÅ m·ªôt object m·ªõi v·ªõi c√°c key l√† key c·ªßa c√°c object con l·ªìng nhau.

  • Source code üìÉ
  • Ch·∫°y th·ª≠ üßë‚Äçüíª
FlattenObject.js
/**
 * Flattens an object to a single level object
 * @param {object} obj Object to flatten 
 * @returns An object with all keys and values flattened
 */
function FlattenObject(obj) {
    const flattened = {};

    Object.keys(obj).forEach((key) => {
        if (typeof obj[key] === 'object' && obj[key] !== null) {
            Object.assign(flattened, flattenObject(obj[key]));
        } else {
            flattened[key] = obj[key];
        }
    });

    return flattened;
}
Tr√¨nh so·∫°n th·∫£o tr·ª±c tuy·∫øn
/**
 * Flattens an object to a single level object
 * @param {object} obj Object to flatten 
 * @returns An object with all keys and values flattened
 */
function FlattenObject(obj) {
  const flattened = {};


  Object.keys(obj).forEach((key) => {
    if (typeof obj[key] === 'object' && obj[key] !== null) {
      Object.assign(flattened, FlattenObject(obj[key]));
    } else {
      flattened[key] = obj[key];
    }
  });


  return flattened;
}


const data = {
  "word": "pho",
  "meanings": {
    "partOfSpeech": "noun",
    "definitions": "A Vietnamese soup with a beef base, typically served with rice noodles and beef or chicken."
  }
}


var result = FlattenObject(data, "");
render(JSON.stringify(result));

2.2. Flatten object with key‚Äã

H√†m n√†y s·∫Ω gi√∫p b·∫°n l√†m ph·∫≥ng m·ªôt object c√≥ c√°c object con l·ªìng nhau. N√≥ s·∫Ω tr·∫£ v·ªÅ m·ªôt object m·ªõi v·ªõi c√°c key l√† key c·ªßa c√°c object con l·ªìng nhau, nh∆∞ng c√≥ th√™m key c·ªßa object cha ·ªü ƒë·∫ßu key c·ªßa object con.

  • Source code üìÉ
  • Ch·∫°y th·ª≠ üßë‚Äçüíª
FlattenObjectWithKey.js
/**
 * Flattens a javascript object with the keys as the path
 * @param {object} obj A javascript object to flatten
 * @param {string} prefix A prefix to add to keys
 * @returns An object with all keys and values flattened
 */
function FlattenObjectWithKey(obj, prefix = '') {
    return Object.keys(obj).reduce((acc, k) => {
        const pre = prefix.length ? `${prefix}.` : '';
        if (typeof obj[k] === 'object' && obj[k] !== null && !Array.isArray(obj[k])) {
            Object.assign(acc, FlattenObjectWithKey(obj[k], pre + k));
        } else {
            acc[pre + k] = obj[k];
        }
        return acc;
    }, {});
}
Tr√¨nh so·∫°n th·∫£o tr·ª±c tuy·∫øn
/**
 * Flattens a javascript object with the keys as the path
 * @param {object} obj A javascript object to flatten
 * @param {string} prefix A prefix to add to keys
 * @returns An object with all keys and values flattened
 */
function FlattenObjectWithKey(obj, prefix = '') {
  return Object.keys(obj).reduce((acc, k) => {
    const pre = prefix.length ? `${prefix}.` : '';
    if (typeof obj[k] === 'object' && obj[k] !== null && !Array.isArray(obj[k])) {
      Object.assign(acc, FlattenObjectWithKey(obj[k], pre + k));
    } else {
      acc[pre + k] = obj[k];
    }
    return acc;
  }, {});
}


const data = {
  "word": "pho",
  "meanings": {
    "partOfSpeech": "noun",
    "definitions": "A Vietnamese soup with a beef base, typically served with rice noodles and beef or chicken."
  }
}


var result = FlattenObjectWithKey(data, "");
render(JSON.stringify(result));

item.title: MDX Blog Post
item.description: Blog posts support Docusaurus Markdown features, such as MDX.
item.content:encoded:
Blog posts support Docusaurus Markdown features, such as MDX.

m·∫πo

Use the power of React to create interactive blog posts.

<button onClick={() => alert('button clicked!')}>Click me!</button>
